oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STATE OF GROIN DESIGN AND EFFECTIVENESS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Balsillie, J.H.
Berg, D.W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: groin
groin design
groin effectiveness
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An annotated bibliography on groins, compiled by Balsillie and Bruno (1972J, has provided the background for this paper. A review of functional design criteria is presented including groin length, height, spacing, permeability-adjustability, and orientation. A discussion of coastal processes and their relationship to groin design and effectiveness is" also given.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 13 (1972): Proceedings of 13th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Vancouver, Canada, 1972.; 71
